overview:
As Chief Financial Officer, Michael Lanham is responsible for finance, human resources, accounting and audit, and office administration for MDV. He also works with the management teams of MDV portfolio companies.

Michael is a Certified Public Accountant. He began his finance career as a senior auditor for Arthur Andersen in Silicon Valley. Since then he has held various financial management positions in the financial services sector.

Prior to that he served in the US Marine Corps as a non-commissioned officer with the 1st Marine Division out of Kaneohe Bay, Hawaii. He served in Desert Shield and Desert Storm 1990-1991.

Michael earned a bachelor’s degree in Business Management magna cum laude and with distinction from Sonoma State University.
